Questions.Quiz: Q.1) Which file is responsible for startup of angular 2 project ?
Questions.explanation: main.ts file is responsible for startup of angular 2 project.

Questions.Quiz: Q.2) Which of the following is correct about TypeScript?

options.text: This is a superset of JavaScript.

Questions.explanation: Angular is based on TypeScript.It is superset of JavaScript and mainatined by Microsoft.

Q.5) Which of the following is not a hook application life cycle?
Questions.explanation: ngViewStart is not a hook application life cycle.

Questions.Quiz: Q.6) Router is part of which of the following module?
Q.7) RxJS can be used for?
Questions.explanation: RxJS can be used for both serer side and browser.

Questions.Quiz: Q.8) Which angular decorator allows us to define the pipe name that is globally available for use in any template in the across application?
Questions.explanation: Pipe decorator allows us to define the pipe name that is globally available for use in any template in the across application

Questions.Quiz: Q.9) What is the decorator used for configuring your module class?
Questions.explanation: @NgModule is the decorator used for configuring your module class.
